Subject: EPP Virtual Appliance SSD Corrupted
Description: Due to unforseen circumstances the SSD in which the vitual disk being used for the VM has been corrupted. We would like to seek assistance on this to have a look on what options can we do in order to make it work again.
What_We_Know__c:
06-05 Customer encounter an issue with their SSD where the EPP VM was hosted.
We have informed them that if they do not have any snapshots that they can use, we will have to install the new EPP VM from scratch.

07-05 customer could not join the session due to personal issues.

08-05 In the meeting we have successfully deployed the new EPP server and configure it .
Next_Steps__c:
06-05 We will schedule a remote session to assist them with the installation.

07-05 A new session has been created.

08-05 The customer will monitor the server for a couple of days and let us if we can proceed with the closure of this case.
